td.content: s:61 yo white m presents with 16 months history of mild low back pain, mild pain radiating from the back to the buttocks and Body Aches. denies any alcohol use Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 74 in, Weight 157 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, patient appears in mild distress due to back pain a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Methocarbamol - 1500 mg po q 12h x 3 days, and ordered CBC, HLA B27, spine XRY.

td.content: s:patient presents with mild pain radiating from the back to the buttocks and mild low back pain x 10 days. he is a 62 yo white male software engineer. o:Height 74 in, Weight 159 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, Extremities: no edema, no cyanosis, normal ROM, straight leg test does not increase pain a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Alendronate sodium - 70 mg po q week, and ordered CBC, HLA B27, spine XRY.
